books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.
books.name: THE MARTIAN

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: A deranged reader’s infatuation with a Salingeresque novelist has dangerous and long-lasting consequences in a sequel to “Mr. Mercedes.”
books.name: FINDERS KEEPERS

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II; the winner of the 2015 Pulitzer Prize.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Laurell K. Hamilton
books.description: The vampire hunter Anita Blake helps the F.B.I. investigate zombie porn.
books.name: DEAD ICE

books.author: by Judy Blume
books.description: Secrets are revealed and love stories play out against the backdrop of a series of panic-inducing plane crashes in 1950s New Jersey.
books.name: IN THE UNLIKELY EVENT

books.author: by Nelson DeMille
books.description: A surveillance expert monitors the activities of a newly resurgent Russia.
books.name: RADIANT ANGEL

books.author: by Dorothea Benton Frank
books.description: Three friends in South Carolina’s Lowcountry grapple with the challenges of being unmarried.
books.name: ALL THE SINGLE LADIES

books.author: by Jessica Knoll
books.description: The life of a successful New York magazine writer is shaken when secrets from her past are revealed in a documentary.
books.name: LUCKIEST GIRL ALIVE

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: A police detective who left the force when his family was murdered teams up with his former partner to solve the case.
books.name: MEMORY MAN

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Mary Balogh
books.description: A guilt-racked survivor of the Napoleonic wars strikes a marriage bargain with a woman who had resigned herself to spinsterhood; a Survivors’ Club novel.
books.name: ONLY A PROMISE

books.author: by Denise Grover Swank
books.description: An impromptu couple find that their pretended engagement is becoming increasingly attractive.
books.name: THE SUBSTITUTE

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: When a video of a shocking crime surfaces, it casts suspicion on a San Francisco detective's colleagues.
books.name: 14TH DEADLY SIN

books.author: by Joseph Finder
books.description: A laid-off reporter investigates his ailing father’s past after he discovers millions of dollars hidden in the old man’s house.
books.name: THE FIXER
